comment.author: 40279093@N00
comment._content: 60. For Winburg read Wynberg, Cape Town. Looking towards Simondstown.

comment.author: 9240882@N06
comment._content: 60. From modern day Wynberg, looking SSW toward Cape Point and Simonstown (naval dockyard). View of Muizenberg mountain in the distance. The bush on the left-hand side of the picture has blocked out the distant view of the Simonsberg mountain at Simonstown.
